backend/main.mo: Defines actor types for users and all entity domains, including membership, publishing, label, recording, and artist development models with supporting enums and helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping rollout tasks to impacted files, components, and test IDs for upgrade validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing frontend components, hooks, and pages focused on upgrade-safe array handling and linking logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the app root and loads main.tsx.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Documents rollout steps including upgrade-safe linking verification and preparation tasks for upcoming builds.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_1_21_2.md: Provides a smoke test checklist to validate core routes, authentication, and Edit Links dialogs after rollout 21.1–21.2 upgrades.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_3_21_4.md: Provides the smoke test checklist for rollout 21.3–21.4, confirming route stability and Edit Links dialog behavior for admin and member roles.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_5_21_6.md: Smoke test checklist for verifying portal loading, detail routes, and Edit Links dialogs after rollout 21.5–21.6.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.7 covering portal access, authorization gates, detail route rendering, and Edit Links dialogs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining routes, layout, auth gates, error components, and page components for the portal.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Checks user approval and admin status, showing a pending-approval screen or allowing access to children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users and displays a sign‑in prompt while protecting gated routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button that manages Internet Identity auth state and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a mandatory profile setup dialog for new authenticated users and submits basic profile data.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access‑denied message with an optional custom message in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Renders a generic empty‑state view with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Shows a destructive alert with friendly error messaging based on backend error text.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Displays a full‑screen skeleton loader for page‑level loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders the top navigation header with branding and an optional login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Provides the authenticated portal layout with sidebar navigation, mobile toggle, and dynamic admin links.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Simple button component for initiating editing of related entity links.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Dialog for selecting and saving related entity IDs with loading, error, and multi‑category selection support.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Filterable multiselect list allowing users to select entity IDs with checkboxes and scrolling.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Provides permission checks for editing records or memberships based on identity, admin status, and ownership.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays related record links with role-based label resolution and defensive normalization for missing data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's role and approval status using the actor, exposing admin and loading state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Builds lists of linkable entity options for admins or callers, normalizing records and handling query modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, approvals, and entity CRUD operations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines a warm neutral theme with light and dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that redirects authenticated users to the portal and displays marketing sections with a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Explains and displays instructions for initializing the first admin via a secret token in the URL.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing counts and recent items across multiple entities with navigation to management pages.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Allows administrators to view known users and assign or change their roles via a role‑selection interface.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays details for a single artist‑development entry with related‐entity linking and edit capabilities based on permissions.
Lists all artist‑development entries and lets admins create new entries via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Displays detailed release info, permissions, normalized fields, and manages editing of related linked entities.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Lists all releases and provides an admin-only dialog to create new releases with basic metadata.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Shows membership profile details, allows editing profile and linked entities, and normalizes related arrays.
Lists membership profiles with status indicators and includes an admin-only form to create new memberships.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Displays publishing work details, supports adding notes and editing linked entities, and normalizes related arrays.
Admin page for listing publishing works and creating new ones with validation of contributor ownership splits.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Displays detailed info for a recording project, normalizes linked entity arrays, and allows admins to edit related links.
Lists recording projects and provides an admin dialog to create new projects with participants, dates, and status.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Utility helpers for safely normalizing, checking, and handling array-like values to avoid undefined/null issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split arrays, ensuring totals are non-negative and do not exceed 100%.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RE: Template for recording manual QA and smoke test results after upgrade, including user info, route checks, and error notes.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist to verify upgrade-safe related-record linking across all detail pages for admins and members.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, notes on requested build/deploy steps, existing features, and known pipeline issues for the Higgins Music platform.
